newsitem.title: SOUTH KOREA: S.Korean feed millers buy 52,500T corn from Peavy.
newsitem.headline: S.Korean feed millers buy 52,500T corn from Peavy.

text.p: Several South Korean feed millers jointly bought 52,500 tonnes of U.S. No.3 yellow corn from Peavy on late Wednesday, traders said on Thursday.

Traders said the millers bought 40,000 tonnes of the total at $139.90 per tonne and the remaining 12,500 tonnes at 88 cents per bushel over May futures on the Chicago Board of Trade. The prices are on a cost and freight basis.
They did not give more details on the millers.
Shipment was set for March 20-April 10 from the Pacific Northwest and arrival for April 25 to the western port of Inchon, they said.
